details: GA of MCP support for Visual Studio: Removed preview notes, added detailed setup instructions for VS in documentation.
Replaced `got` HTTP client with `fetchWithRetry` in 7 files (Hydro, Failbot, search middleware, and scraping scripts).
Added new secret scanning patterns for hCaptcha Siteverify Secret and Tencent WeChat Pay Token.
Updated MCP policy documentation to reflect GA status and clarify authentication restrictions.
